original_text: Even at Horeb you provoked the Lord to wrath, and the Lord was so angry with you that he was ready to destroy you.
korean_text: 호렙 산에서 너희가 여호와를 격노하게 하였으므로 여호와께서 진노하사 너희를 멸하려 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Even at Horeb you provoked the Lord to wrath
and the Lord was so angry with you
that he was ready to destroy you
